turkish_example_sentence: Siz bu eski ve rahatsız sandalyelerde hiçbir konfor hissetmeyecektiniz.
english_example_sentence: You (plural/formal) were not going to feel any comfort in these old and uncomfortable chairs.
russian_example_sentence: Вы не собирались чувствовать никакого комфорта в этих старых и неудобных стульях.
